basic.floral_language:
Salvia lavandulifolia 
Floriography: wise, warm, intellectual
Is a spice and medicinal herb for cooking and medicine. Has long oval leaves covered by short hairs, leaf color gray green, has a strong stimulating smell. Used as a medicine for relieving anxiety and fear, menstrual-related problems such as PMS and cramping, and helping with insomnia.
Likes sunshine, shade properly under summer strong sunlight. Flowering in June-September. Flowers are blue or purple.
basic.color: Leaf color green , flower color purple, blue

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate sunshine, shade properly under summer noon strong light
maintenance.watering: Moderately resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old diseased and dead leaves timely
